description.ko: 수 세기에 걸친 지질학적 압력과 광물의 진화를 기록한 지구 표면의 촉각적 이야기입니다.
description.en: The tactile story of the earth's surface, chronicling centuries of geological pressure and mineral evolution.

prompt: An ultra-detailed macro-topographic photography of TERRA-1. A cross-section of ancient sedimentary layers reveals jagged #8B4513 terracotta rock and #D2691E burnt orange clay infused with glowing #F4A460 crystalline quartz veins. Side lighting creates dramatic shadows across rough #2F4F4F slate textures. 8k resolution, hyper-realistic geological details, showing the narrative of a land carved by eons of pressure.
